text: Like many stories, this period marks a time of slow but steady development. You might grow impatient waiting around for things to happen. Use that time to your advantage. Feed your talents, champion diplomacy and maintain an attitude of flexibility. It will keep you from becoming complacent. You will exude an air of benevolence that will cause people to want to draw close. Let them. Support is a good thing and you will need to learn how to be served as well as how to serve. Also use the time to stop and notice all the beauty that surrounds you. Soak it all in. Let that positivity course through your being and savor the ride.
